title: UI Potion Category Schema â€” Tooling (v2)
description: Extends the base schema for tooling/integration potions (config generators, CI/CD setup, build tools, dev tools, etc.). Provides structured properties for installation, configuration templates, version detection, and integration with IDEs/editors/CI systems.

goal.description: High-level goal of this tooling potion. What does it help developers accomplish?

integration.description: How this tool integrates with the project (detection methods, framework compatibility, etc.)

configuration.description: Configuration details, examples, and templates for the tool

workflow.description: Step-by-step workflow for implementing this tool

compatibility.description: Compatibility information (supported versions, frameworks, environments, etc.)

securityConsiderations.description: Security considerations when using this tool

installation.description: Package installation commands and dependency requirements (npm, yarn, pnpm commands for different scenarios)

versionDetection.description: Critical logic for detecting tool versions, project setup, or configuration format requirements. Essential for tools with breaking changes between versions (e.g., ESLint v9+ flat config vs legacy)

templates.description: Configuration file templates and examples for different frameworks, formats, or scenarios

troubleshooting.description: Common issues, error messages, and their solutions

editorIntegration.description: IDE/editor integration details (VS Code, WebStorm, Vim, etc.) including extension IDs, settings, and configuration

cicdIntegration.description: CI/CD integration examples (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, CircleCI, etc.)

scripts.description: npm/package.json scripts to add for this tool (e.g., lint, format, test, build scripts)
